articles.title: Will Rishi Sunak prove to be more than a good loser? - BBC
articles.description: The PM steadied the Tory ship, but the coming months will see if he keeps it afloat, writes Laura Kuenssberg.
articles.content:
Exactly 12 months ago, Rishi Sunak was preparing to be a good loser.
